Title: Zamfara APC warns members against anti-party activities
Summary: Zamfara State chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) has warned its members against engaging in anti-party activities, stating that it will no longer tolerate such acts, which are aimed at creating political friction and division within the party .

Title: 2027: Group begs Tukur to vie for Nasarawa governorship
Summary: Group begs Shehu Ahmed-Tukur to vie for Nasarawa governorship in 2027 . The group, popularly known as Architect Shehu . Ahmed Tukur Vanguard (ASAT), is drawn predominantly from Nasarwa Western Senatorial zone .

Title: North-Central Devt Commission to bridge regional gaps, says Akume
Summary: George Akume called on leaders and stakeholders of the North-Central region to deepen collaboration and remain committed to the development goals of the N-Central Development Commission (NCDC) He said the establishment of the commission to bridge regional gaps, says Akume .

Title: Kebbi school abduction sets off military push, political backlash, regional alarms
Summary: Army chief orders pursuit of kidnappers, meets vigilantes for joint operations . Gani Adams warns of looming attacks in S’West, faults govs’ silence . PDP blames Tinubu for Kebbi school abduction .

Title: Fears of one-party drift intensify as PDP crisis worsens, turns violent
Summary: Fears of one-party drift intensify as PDP crisis worsens, turns violent . Makinde-Bala Mohammed camp storms secretariat to reclaim control . Wike-backed faction expels three govs, senior leaders in sweeping purge .

Title: Nigeria accounts for less than 2.3% of global seafarers
Summary: Nigeria accounts for less than 2.3% of global seafarers . Only about 6,000 sailors registered out of 1.9 million seafarers listed worldwide . Capt. Rasheed Onakoya of the Nigerian Association of Master Mariners (NAMM) disclosed this in a presentation at the quarterly lecture of the association .

Title: Nigeria hits 1.7m bpd oil production multiple times — NUPRC
Summary: Nigeria's oil output has exceeded 1.7 million barrels per day, bpd, several times this year . Chief Executive of the Commission, Engr. Gbenga Komolafe, disclosed this at capacity building training for journalists in Lagos, yesterday . He also said Nigeria’s rig count, an oil rig count

Title: Nigeria’s external reserves  rises to  $46 billion, highest in 7yrs
Summary: Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria said that the nation’s external reserves has risen to $46.7 billion, representing the highest in seven years, since 2028 . Mr. Yemi Cardoso disclosed this in Abuja at the opening of the Monetary Policy Department .

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, November 19, 2025
Summary: The naira held steady on Wednesday as the official Daily Nigerian Foreign Exchange Market (NFEM) fixing traded in the mid-₦1,400s .

Title: Pound to Naira exchange rate today, November 19, 2025
Summary: The British pound traded at around ₦1,930 in Nigeria’s parallel market on Wednesday . Inter-bank rates hovered near the � credible mark .
